body.p:
As the Content Author, to share your created tasks with Reviewers so that they can proofread, add comments, and make changes to the uploaded documents, follow these steps:
In the Content Fusion Task Manager view, click on the name of the particular task that you want to share. This opens the task details in the interface in your most recently used browser.
Click the Share button to display a link to the task and click on the Copy button to copy the link to the clipboard.
Open your email or whatever electronic messaging system your organization uses, paste the copied link, and send it to Reviewers that you want to look at the documents.
